title: Dépanneur Beau-soir logo blocky compact sans
content:
Hi,

Can someone could tell me what the name of this font (Beau-soir)

Thank you

Marc

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023205304im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1-Beau-Soir-2-PMS_4034.jpg)
author: Marc C

comments.content: I fear this'll probably be a custom drawn logo. Let's wait and see if anybody knows this baby.

I may be wrong, but the way the letters in Beau-soir look reminds me of what happens when you start playing with outline points in Illustrator. I would guess at least part of it started out as a square sans like [Europa Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023205304/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/europa-grotesque-rr/extra-bold/) that has been flattened. Maybe something squarer, but you get the idea.

- Mike Yanega
